ActJudges Act
SubjectShirley Perras ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. Delmar W. Perras **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to SHIRLEY PERRAS, survivor of the Hon. Delmar W. Perras, a Judge of the Court of Queen's Bench of Alberta, effective April 19, 2015.
